sections.heading: Supervisor of mutuels; pari-mutuel auditors; other employees; stewards5-106
sections.text: Supervisor of mutuels; pari-mutuel auditors; other employees; stewardsA. The director shall appoint a supervisor of mutuels, security personnel and as many other employees as may be necessary for the enforcement of the laws
